name: I`m Alone
description:
In this RPG game, you will have to move from one room to another, loot chests and overcome upcoming difficulties in order to win the game by taking the final artifact.

1) target entities - slimes;

2) Control :

    1) LMB - move;

    2) RMB - open the chest;

    3) RMB + W - attack with bow;

3) Good luck in passing my game!
